storyInfo: Laterano implements a strict arms control policy, shutting down all its firearms workshops. Exusiai arrives at one of these firearms workshops in search of materials she can use to make explosives. The Shrine of Nurtury continues to take in refugees of all races and nationalities on a large scale.

attributes.content: Firearms Workshop, Via Borgos, Pagus Faber
Hello...? Anybody home?
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Sculptures of saints line the walls of the small workshop, acting as makeshift display shelves, exhibiting guns to would-be customers in impossible arrangements.
But Amos does not see a single customer. No one stops at the door to the workshop, except for himself. His first feeling is that the whole place seems cold and cheerless.
Not even the proprietor is present. Gazing on the dim light cast upon the sculptures, his second feeling is one of eeriness.
Senior Paganini? Are you in?
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: (Why would a gunsmith have such an absurd name?)
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Amos looks around, then bumps into something.
He looks around and finds himself staring into a pair of massive, luminous eyes that peer straight at him from the shadows.
Eek—
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Who are you, barging into my place like this—let me put my glasses on!
attributes.name: Massive Eyes

attributes.content: A functionary?
attributes.name: Massive Eyes

attributes.content: Sorry. I was taking a nap because there's been no business lately. I wasn't expecting an official visit.
attributes.name: Massive Eyes

attributes.content: I am Cardinal Aide Amos. I came to see that the handover of this Firearms Workshop is in order. And you are...?
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: I'm Paganini. The guy with the absurd name.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Wait. You're a Liberi?
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Do I look like a Sankta to you?
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Sorry. What I meant is, I've never seen a Liberi in this line of work. After all, only Sankta use patron firearms—
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Got a problem with it?
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Chefs don't necessarily eat their own cooking. I can't use the weapons I make, that's all.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Do you need my gunsmith's license? I must have made close to a thousand patron firearms for the people of Laterano, if not more. Maybe even yours...
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Whew, this is some real 'premium' work. Well above my craftsmanship, that's for sure.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Not that it matters anymore. I'm about to close up shop.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: All recent orders have been cancelled. The Notarial Hall can have this last batch of guns.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Y-You've already prepared. I thought...
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Thought I would be trouble? Thought I would give you a hard time?
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Th-That's not what I meant.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: The registrar indicates that this workshop has been around for a century. As a Liberi who has chosen to make patron firearms for the Sankta, it must hold incredible significance to you—
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Save it. Anyone could tell that gunsmiths have become a dying breed these last few years. We've all been waiting for the day to come.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: If you're asking whether I like it or not: No, of course I don't like it. Do you want to hear about the insomnia I've had lately?
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: I can arrange a confessional for you, if you wish. The Seventh Tribunal will cover the cost.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: If anyone here needs a confession, it's you.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: This old man's set to retire. But my apprentice, Vannini, she hasn't even had the chance to make her own patron firearm.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: If all the Firearms Workshops are gone, you'll be responsible for her future.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Of course. Closing the Firearms Workshops is part of a process to make the firearms manufacturing more standardized and efficient. Gunsmiths like you and your apprentice remain valuable talent.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: I will pass this on to the Sixth Tribunal, which is responsible for civil matters. Your apprentice, Vannini, should receive a recommendation to the Shrine of Gunsmithing in Pagus Michaelion, which is almost complete.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Shrine of Gunsmithing, huh...? I hope they're that confident when they actually start smithing guns.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: I have faith in Laterano's...
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Yeah, yeah, I've heard it too many times.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: ...If you have no objection, I would like to ask you to sign these papers.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Effective immediately, this workshop will cease operation, with the Notarial Hall handling follow-up matters.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Pleasant day to you, senior.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: See yourself out.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Pagus Faber, Via Borgos... how familiar.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: This is the place!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Has the connection been established?
attributes.name: Lupo

attributes.content: I-I think so.
attributes.name: Kuranta

attributes.content: We've been waiting for two days on the outskirts. I want to go out and get some fresh air!
attributes.name: Kuranta

attributes.content: These Laterans invited us onto this mobile abbey while we were wandering in the wilderness, then made us wait like this once we got to Laterano.
attributes.name: Feline

attributes.content: I apologize for keeping you waiting.
attributes.name: Busy Nun

attributes.content: Twelve other nomadic abbeys have reached Laterano, in addition to the busy schedule of the Summit of Nations. We beg your understanding.
attributes.name: Busy Nun

attributes.content: The Notarial Hall has prepared temporary accommodations in Pagus Ambrosius. Once you've settled down, the Sixth Tribunal will help you with your registration and social welfare.
attributes.name: Busy Nun

attributes.content: S-Sister? Do you mean that outsiders like us will get to stay in Laterano?
attributes.name: Lupo

attributes.content: From the second Summit of Nations, Laterano's doors will be open to all races...
attributes.name: Busy Nun

attributes.content: You shall find a home in the city.
attributes.name: Busy Nun

attributes.content: Hey, Extra! Are you alright?
I'll find a doctor!
No!
You can't let the Sankta find out, not yet...
Please let me through.
attributes.name: Busy Nun

attributes.content: D-Don't worry about it, Sister.
attributes.name: Kuranta

attributes.content: We can take care of this. You're busy, aren't you?
attributes.name: Feline

attributes.content: Argh—
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: Are you... pregnant, Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Busy Nun

attributes.content: Your people didn't stop the Sarkaz from entering the abbey! You're gonna make it a problem now?
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: You want me to go, I'll go! I don't need help from the Sankta!
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: You won't lay a hand on me or my baby!
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: You misunderstand. It's just we have no directive for accommodating pregnant mothers in the abbey's standard operating procedures, and thus Sister Angie is not sure what to do.
Allow me to bring her to the Shrine of Nurtury, Sister Angie.
The Shrine of Nurtury is not yet open to the public. This is against regulations.
attributes.name: Busy Nun

attributes.content: Besides, what are you doing here?
attributes.name: Busy Nun

attributes.content: Our Lord has guided me to where I should be.
We must have some flexibility. The Shrine of Nurtury cannot ignore an ailing mother.
Yes, Matriarch.
attributes.name: Busy Nun

attributes.content: I am Keph, Matriarch of the Shrine of Nurtury. Simply put, I am its caretaker.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: The woman with golden hair turns slowly toward the Sarkaz. Her voice is soft yet crystal clear, seemingly carefully probing.
The Sarkaz sees the two black horns on the woman's head, then turns her gaze to the woman's eyes. She sees an empty void underneath the intricate patterns of the eyepatch.
What are you... Sarkaz? Sankta? Blind, too?
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: Sarkaz, Sankta... we have no need of these words of distinction. You and I, we are alike... like you, I am nurturing lives that I treasure.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: My lack of sight does not prevent me from perceiving you and the new life you carry... the anxiety and joy that it brings you.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: We Sarkaz don't talk this way. You're Sankta, a strange Sankta with children.
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: Do you raise your children in that... Shrine of something? What kind of place is it?
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: The Shrine of Nurtury, where new life is born and nurtured. You and I stand in its shadow.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: A shrine... for giving birth?
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: Birth is sacred. Each new birth is a continuation of the Lateran faith. Only in this way may we shape the future.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: I don't understand.
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: Long have you wandered the wilderness. You have not enjoyed the care that a mother should. You are weak... and so is your child.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Are you sure you want to leave the Holy City that is so near and return to the wilderness at a time like this?
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Your name is 'Extra', madam?
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: You don't like it?
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: We understand the difficulties facing the Sarkaz... many Sarkaz mothers name their children 'Extra', seeing them as nothing more than a little extra in their lives.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: This name's got nothing to do with my mom. I took it myself after I got pregnant. Who's to say who's the extra?
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: Ah...
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: You got a problem?
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: You treasure your bonds with your child. You are proud of having this little extra in your life, and you want everyone to know.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: This is a wonderful, noble sentiment, madam. It should not be tainted by racism or hatred.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: I know what you fear.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: All people here in this abbey, Sankta, Feline, Kuranta, Lupo, and Vulpo alike bear witness.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: The Summit of Nations is underway. Countless outlanders from all nations have flocked to Laterano. Laterano would not be foolish enough to harm a pregnant mother with all this attention.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: (Nods)
attributes.name: Kuranta

attributes.content: (Casts a glance)
attributes.name: Lupo

attributes.content: You have my word.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: Thank you for your understanding.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Let us welcome the birth of a new life together in Laterano. It will bridge a gulf and bring new meaning. This birth will be a great achievement.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: This is why I have come... Our Lord has guided me to where I should be.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Welcome to Laterano... you are needed here, all of you.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Whatever it is you're after, I'm sure I can't help you.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: I haven't said anything yet!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Alright, Seniora Sankta, what do you want? Do you need your guardian gun fixed, or you want some custom ammo?
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Go out the door and turn left. You might just find one of the last Firearms Workshops in Pagus Michaelion that hasn't shut down yet, if you can get there before the functionaries.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: I signed the handover documents from the Seventh Tribunal ten minutes ago. I'd be violating the Law if I did anything with this stuff now.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: What if I said I wanted to make an explosion that would shake the city?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Not interested.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Come on! You're Master Pag, the King of Gunsmiths! If anyone would want to see an explosion, it's you!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Don't butter me up with a title you just made up on the spot.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: I know what you're afraid of, Master Pag.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: All I need is a little help—lend me some equipment, some of your expert knowledge—to help me figure out what's going on in Laterano.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I'm really anxious about all this.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: My boss always says nothing gets in the way of Penguin Logistics completing our mission, or the after party!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Uh...
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: You don't need to DO anything. That way, you won't be violating the Law, right?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Get your guardian gun away from my collection, Sankta.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Besides, I know this gun. I made the damned thing—
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Haha. Recognize it, don't you?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Then you also know how powerful it is.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I got Dr. Paola to make a new pair of glasses for you, magister! She admonished me to no end, she says it's your punishment to keep wearing those antiques of yours...
Here, try them on! Uh—
Wh-Who's this? What's going on, Magister Paganini?
Hey, if it isn't the quiet little girl! Look how fluently you can gab now!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What was your name again? Vanheim? Vannessa? Oh, I know—
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: —Vannini!
attributes.name: Exusiai & Vannini

attributes.content: See? We still got our teamwork!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I remember now! You're El! You came to pick your first patron firearm...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Magister Paganini never lets me bother the customers when they come to the shop. But there was such a ruckus outside that day, I couldn't help but peek...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Magister Paganini found me out, though. I don't remember much else because I was so scared he was going to yell at me... sorry!
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Oh, so that's why? You were afraid...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (Nods)
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Weird, I thought you looked happy.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What brings you here today, El?
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: (Winks)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Vani.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: The Seventh Tribunal came today. My workshop is...
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: I'm not officially a gunsmith yet. I don't actually work for this shop. It's not against the Law, strictly speaking.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Can I help this customer, Magister?
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Gotcha, Senior Nurturer!
attributes.name: Obstinate Child

attributes.content: Where did you go? Romya said you were hiding from us. Is that true?
attributes.name: Proud Child

attributes.content: Of course not.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Then let's play Halo!
attributes.name: Obstinate Child

attributes.content: Father Andoain is very busy. How about you guys play with me?
Your Eminence.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I have some private matters to attend to. I'll be back soon.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: No need to be nervous. I have your leave request on file. What I really should ask is, what are you doing here with the children when you're supposed to be on leave?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I thought I had enough time for one round of Halo.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: And then? Did you think the children would let you go so easily?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I'll think of something.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I've heard you're completely incapable of saying 'no' to the children.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Who could ever imagine that the first Nurturer the Matriarch nurtured, one whose diligence and piety are beyond question, was once a criminal who violated the Law?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I'm only attending the family gathering of a friend I've not seen in a long time, Your Eminence.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I told you, no need to be nervous. I'm not worried about you burning Laterano while blowing a balloon or baking a cake.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I'm just curious. Why is there such a stark difference between how the Matriarch sees you, and your profile in the Curia's records?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: The Matriarch has never overlooked or denied my sins, Your Eminence. She simply places more importance on my understanding with her.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: It was before she became Matriarch. Our paths crossed by sheer chance, when I was taking refuge from a Catastrophe in an abandoned nomadic abbey.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: The Matriarch may be blind, but her sense of hearing is impeccable. She caught a faint cry coming from the basement, in the midst of the deafening roar of Originium dashing against the distant mountains.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: A mother, lying in a pool of blood in the shadows on death's door. She attempted to intimidate the Matriarch and protect her own child, but all she managed was an expression of great pain.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: The mother you and the Matriarch first brought to the Holy City? Her injuries were such that even the most determined physician would have given up hope.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: What made you think she would live?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I didn't... I didn't even think she would last the night. But the Matriarch had faith in a miracle, as though it was an inevitability.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: The Matriarch wanted me to believe too, believe that the poor mother would find salvation, thanks to us.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: And she did... at first, without medical training, all I could do was empathize and be by her side, caring for her in what ways I could.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: You lingered in a stranded abbey for three months, for the sake of a miracle?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: ...Laterano needs a miracle.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Then you're much more rational than I thought, both of you. Perhaps I should see you in a different light.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Certainly, if it convinces the Curia to offer greater support for the Shrine of Nurtury.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: So rational it's almost boring.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Hurry along now, Nurturer Andoain. At the very least, I hope to see the Nativity through without a hitch.
attributes.name: Velliv
